data.name: Quick Claw
data.summary: Held: Holder has a 3/16 (18.75%) chance to move first.
data.description:
Held in battle
:   Whenever the holder attempts to use a move, it has a 3/16 chance to act first among moves with the same priority.  If multiple Pokémon have this effect at the same time, Speed is the tie-breaker as normal, but the effect of []{move:trick-room} is ignored.
